turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help with an order I placed last week. It still hasn't shipped!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly assist you with that. Can you please provide your order number so I can look into the status for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's #12345. Honestly, I'm starting to get a little frustrated. I needed this item for a trip this weekend.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I've checked order #12345 and it appears there was a slight delay in processing due to a high volume of orders. It's now scheduled to ship tomorrow. I apologize for the inconvenience. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thank you for the update. But I have another question. Your site says you offer free returns, but the item description has conflicting information. Does that mean I have to pay for return shipping or not?
